title: #122: The Illusion of Freedom
description:
The great Frank Zappa had a way with words, both in his lyrics that we wrote and the interviews that he gave. He could see through the lies and had a deep understanding of where this world was heading. He would be horrified at what society has become these days, but probably not too surprised.

From Constitution Free Zones to Wokeness to the Vax Passports, this world is slowly marching into a dystopian hellscape run by deluded individuals that want to take society back to a much simpler time when the very few controlled the many.

As the freedom to express oneself is incrementally chipped away by those in positions of power, the old saying that “the beatings will continue until morale improves” becomes more like a mantra of the Predator Class than a running joke.
